original_text: What I do want to see is justice! I want to see that you always do what is right. Those good things should never stop, like a river that always runs with water. What I do want to see is justice! I want to see that you always do what is right. Those good things should never stop, like a river that always runs with water. What I do want to see is justice! I want to see that you always do what is right. Those good things should never stop, like a river that always runs with water.
korean_text: 오직 정의를 물 같이, 공의를 마르지 않는 강 같이 흐르게 할지어다

sentences.original_text: What I do want to see is justice!
I want to see that you always do what is right.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 보고 싶은 것은 너희가 항상 올바른 일을 하는 것이다.

sentences.original_text: Those good things should never stop,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 좋은 것들은 결코 멈추지 말아야 한다.

sentences.original_text: like a river that always runs with water.
